team.name: Big Mike Mosley
team.bio: Mike's been selling cars for 25 YEARS! He knows EVERY trick in the book to get you the BEST DEAL! Don't let his friendly smile fool you - he's SERIOUS about cars!

team.name: Speedy Sally
team.bio: Sally can get you APPROVED faster than you can say 'VROOM VROOM'! She's got connections with ALL the banks and will fight for YOUR best interest rate!

team.name: Wrench Willie
team.bio: Willie's been fixing cars since he was knee-high to a grasshopper! Every car on our lot gets the WILLIE TREATMENT - guaranteed to run like NEW!
